statement.name: proposalAbstractDelete
statement.value: delete from osp$eps_prop_abstract where PROPOSAL_NUMBER={PROPOSAL_NUMBER} and ABSTRACT_TYPE_CODE ={ABSTRACT_TYPE_CODE} and UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ={UPDATE_TIMESTAMP}

statement.name: proposalAbstractInsert
statement.value: insert into osp$eps_prop_abstract( PROPOSAL_NUMBER, ABSTRACT_TYPE_CODE , ABSTRACT , UPDATE_TIMESTAMP , UPDATE_USER ) VALUES ( {PROPOSAL_NUMBER} , {ABSTRACT_TYPE_CODE} , {ABSTRACT} , {UPDATE_TIMESTAMP} , {UPDATE_USER} )

statement.name: proposalAbstractUpdate
